name: Super Ball Mania
description:
Games are 10 rounds long with 4 players, by default. To add or remove players, visit the character customization screen.

    Features:
  • 10 unique minigames
  • Character customization
  • Partially customizable bindings
  • Up to 8-player local multiplayer (with the help of a third-party controller grouping program)

Click "Play Now" on the game select screen to automatically add all games to the game selection, and jump right into the action! Players will play "Ballf With Your Friends, Color Clash, Cumulonimble, Flappy Balls, Hot Potato, Light On Your Feet, Most Wanted, Row Race, Simon Says, and Sumo." Controllers are automatically assigned to the first x number of players in the game, depending on x number of controllers plugged in to the computer. If there are any players without controllers to be assigned to them, they will be automatically assigned keyboard controls. Keyboard controls can be found on the main menu. Controls can also be reassigned on the Character Customization screen.



Have fun playing my game! If you have suggestions or run into a bug, send me a message at the email address in the support section.
